alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 2:01PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ascension, southeastern West Baton Rouge, west central Livingston, east central Iberville and south central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 230 PM CDT... At 201 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gardere, or near Oak Hills Place, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Denham Springs, Gonzales, Plaquemine, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Addis, Brusly, Westminster, Old Jefferson, Geismar, Inniswold, Prairieville, Village St. George, Shenandoah, Gardere and Carville. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 159 and 178. Interstate 12 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; Iberville; Northern Livingston; West Baton Rouge; Western Ascension
